txt.en:
'You are here to free me? Skorgrím Dourhand has raised a goblin army in the cleft of Rath Teraig, and unless we stop him, he will sweep through all the free lands!

'There is no time to waste, my friend. We will need to defeat the Captain and his crew if we are to escape from Kheledûl with our lives and bring word of the danger which grows stronger within Rath Teraig!

'The captain will soon return. Quickly, untie my hands! We need to escape from here!'

Avorthal is being held on the \qIrestone,\q the ship docked at the port-city of Kheledûl.\n\nUnless you free him tonight, the \qIrestone\q will carry Avorthal far from rescue and doom Ered Luin to war between dwarves and Elves.
Avorthal is on the deck of the \qIrestone,\q still docked at Kheledûl.\n\nThe Captain of the \qIrestone\q has been defeated. You should speak with Avorthal and make your escape.
'Who's swimming in the canal? Identify yourself!'
'To me! To me! I have found an enemy!'
'Who's that in the water? I can hear you splashing about!'
'I hear you splashing around down there! Come out and fight!'
'There's someone over here! To me, dwarves!'
'Come to my aid, you worthless thin-beards!'
'You don't belong here! Dourhands, to me!'
'Throw the intruders from my ship, you good-for-nothing sea-dogs!'
Svanr, the former harbour-master of Kheledûl, has brought you a down a hidden path to the gates of the city. It is now up to you to <rgb=#FF0000>sneak into Kheledûl and free Avorthal</rgb>.
'Guard the stairs! Don't let the intruders out of the water!'
'Keep your eyes on the water, my kinsmen!'

'We must hurry, [placeholder]. Skorgrím has assembled an army of goblins within Rath Teraig, and though my rescue should end the threat of war between dwarves and Elves, I fear that the goblin-army will not long remain within that narrow pass.\n\n'Let us bring this warning out of Kheledûl into the light of morning, and may our chances for peace also shine bright!'
